name: seo-audit-etl
title: SEO Audit ETL (ZIP â†’ normalized JSON + scores)

input.title: Audit ETL Input
input.description: Provide the client info and a public/signed URL to the dated audit ZIP.

client.title: Client slug
client.description: Short identifier for the client (e.g., acme).

domain.title: Primary domain
domain.description: The site domain for this audit (e.g., acme.com).

runDate.title: Run date (YYYY-MM-DD)
runDate.description: The date label for this audit run, used in outputs.

zipUrl.title: ZIP URL
zipUrl.description: Public or signed URL to the dated audit ZIP (Google Drive direct download or similar).
